description: Prototype rich text editor with improved link workflow
syntax: <tooldrawer-field type='textedit' label='{{LABEL}}' size='md' path='{{PATH}}' placeholder='Enter text...' />

label.description: Title shown in the editor popover header

size.description: Editor size - md (24px height) or lg (32px height)

path.description: Data path in instanceData for binding (e.g., 'heading', 'description')

placeholder.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit
placeholder.description: Default text content shown in preview and editor

allowLinks.description: Whether to allow hyperlinks in the editor content. Use false for non-interactive text.

show-if.description: Path to toggle/dropdown that controls visibility of this field. Field only shows when toggle is true or dropdown matches show-when value.

show-when.description: For dropdowns only: Value that dropdown must equal to show this field. Requires show-if attribute.

features.linkPanel: Add hyperlinks with URL validation, new tab option, and nofollow attribute

examples.code: <tooldrawer-field type='textedit' label='Rich text' size='md' path='bodyHtml' placeholder='Describe your offerâ€¦' />

dataBinding.description: Editor content automatically syncs to instanceData[path] as HTML string with inline formatting
